ThingDef.label: Krieg trench coat
ThingDef.description: Krieg-pattern trench coat serves a dual purpose: it is both a military uniform and a fully sealed garment, designed to protect a guardsman from the radioactive soil and air of their homeworld, as well as from mud, rain and various other elements encountered on any battlefield where the Death Korps of Krieg set their feet.

ThingDef.label: Krieg-pattern flak armor
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue flak armor, designed on Krieg, the homeworld of Death Korps of Krieg. It is relatively cheap and easy to produce on an average Imperial world. Usually flak armor consists of a skeleton, composed of flexible, lightweight metals. The skeleton is wrapped in several layers of ablative, shock-resistant materials and ballistic textiles. Once multiple layers of fabric are affixed to the skeleton, the armor is given its toughened outer shell. This combination of materials provides a decent degree of protection against most stub-weaponry and energy weapons, comparable to a lasgun.\n\nThis particular type of flak armor was designed and adopted by Death Korps of Krieg Astra Militarum Regiments, as the result of their more than millennia-long experience in siege warfare.

ThingDef.description: A standard-issue flak vest, designed on Krieg, the homeworld of Death Korps of Krieg. It is relatively cheap and easy to produce on an average Imperial world. Usually flak vest consists of a skeleton, composed of flexible, lightweight metals. The skeleton is wrapped in several layers of ablative, shock-resistant materials and ballistic textiles. Once multiple layers of fabric are affixed to the skeleton, the vest is given its toughened outer shell. This combination of materials provides a decent degree of protection against most stub-weaponry and energy weapons, comparable to a lasgun.\n\nThis particular type of flak armor was designed and adopted by Death Korps of Krieg Astra Militarum Regiments, as the result of their more than millennia-long experience in siege warfare. This particular vest lacks shoulder protection.

ThingDef.label: Krieg-pattern flak helmet
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue helmet used by Death Korps of Krieg regiments of Astra Militarum. Despite its design closely resembling the ones from the ancient days of Terra, dating back to M2, its rather archaic appearance shouldn't deceive you: such helmets are more than capable of providing a decent degree of protection against most stub-weaponry and energy weapons, comparable to a lasgun.

ThingDef.label: Krieg gas mask
ThingDef.description: A standard-issue gas mask is a necessary part of the uniform for every single Death Korps of Krieg guardsman. The main reason for this is the fact that Krieg is essentially a Death World, having survived a 500 years-long civil war that has been waged using nuclear weapons. Hundreds of years of nuclear winter have rendered Krieg's surface incapable of sustaining life, making a gas mask a necessity both on its desolate landscape and on any other battlefield where the Death Korps of Krieg fights for their retribution in the eyes of the Emperor of Mankind.
